articles.title: Turkey probes how Nissan chief Ghosn fled via Istanbul
articles.description: Turkish media say authorities are investigating possible security flaws that allowed former Nissan Chairman Carlos Ghosn to skip bail in Japan and flee to Lebanon via Istanbul
articles.content:
ANKARA, Turkey -- 
Turkish authorities are investigating possible security flaws that allowed former Nissan Chairman Carlos Ghosn to skip bail in Japan and flee to Lebanon via Istanbul, Turkish media reported Thursday.

articles.title: Floods in Indonesia capital kill 17, force thousands to flee
articles.description: Severe flooding and landslides triggered by torrential rain in Indonesia's capital have killed 17 people and displaced tens of thousands
articles.content:
JAKARTA, Indonesia -- 
Severe flooding and landslides triggered by torrential rain in Indonesia's capital have killed 17 people and displaced tens of thousands, a disaster official said Thursday.
